POTSDAM_HBF.scene_description:
You are sitting on a bench at the tram station at Potsdam Central Station.
You look at the timetable and see that your tram will arrive in 7 minutes.
You close your eyes and feel the sunlight on your face.
When suddenly…
You remember that you forgot that you didn't got the book from the library after your course.
You need the book to study for next week's exam.
POTSDAM_HBF.query: Do you want to hurry and go get the next train to Golm before the library closes?
POTSDAM_HBF.get train:
It seems like you've lost your semester ticket.
You need to buy a ticket to get on the train.
What do you wanna do?

TICKET_MACHINE.query: A ticket to Golm and back costs 5€, but to get one you first have guess the missing word in the following sentence:
TICKET_MACHINE.wrong: I'm sorry, that's not the searched word. Try again!
TICKET_MACHINE.wrong3x: I'm sorry, that's still not the searched word. Here another sentence for you:
TICKET_MACHINE.###:
Okay, this time I'm gonna turn a blind eye.
If you're interested, the solution was:
TICKET_MACHINE.win: That's correct! Here is your train ticket.

TRAIN_1.scene_description: You solved the game really fast! You hurry to the platform. Luckily, the next train to Golm is just waiting there.
TRAIN_1.query: What do you wanna do next?

TRAIN_2.scene_description:
Good job on finding the word!
Sadly, it took you pretty long and you missed the first train, but the next one is just entering the station and you enter it.

TICKET_CONTROL.scene_description: SURPRISE! It must be your lucky day! You got into a ticket control.

FEE.scene_description:
It seems, (since you're not used to buy any) that you didn't validate your ticket before getting on the train.
Now you need to pay a 15€ fee.

LIBRARY.scene_description: Finally you arrived at the library and that just on time. Now you need to hurry, because the library is about to close soon.
LIBRARY.query: Guess the animal by its definition and you will get your book.
LIBRARY.wrong: Unfortunately that's not the searched animal. Have another guess!
LIBRARY.wrong3x: The animal was {animal}. Here a new animal to guess. Good Luck!
LIBRARY.###:
Congratulations! You cheated your way through this game! Your parents must be pretty proud.
Go take your book!
LIBRARY.win: Congratulations! You guessed the animal! Now you can finally take the book home with you.

GOT_BOOK.scene_description: Yay! You made it and got the book just in time! Now it's time to relax a bit.
GOT_BOOK.no_money:
Unfortunately you already spent all your money, so you haven't any left for a coffee.
What else can you think of to do?

NO_BOOK.scene_description: You are too late! :( The library is already closed. Go get a coffee, maybe it will cheer you up.

COFFEE.scene_description: Here is your coffee, I hope it tastes good.

BOOK.scene_description: You sit down to read your book.

REPLAY.query: Do you wanna play another round?
REPLAY.no_option: Sorry, I don't understand. Is this a 'yes' or a 'no'?

EXIT.scene_description: Good Bye! It was nice playing with you!
